title: Grain and nut wholemeal pancakes
ingredients: ['120g porridge oats', '180g wholemeal flour', '2 teaspoons bicarbonate of soda', '1 teaspoon baking powder', '1/2 teaspoon salt', '350ml buttermilk', '250ml milk', '60ml vegetable oil', '1 egg', '5 tablespoons caster sugar', '3 tablespoons chopped walnuts (optional)']
